This program produces a grid with lines every ten pixels.

```{r grid}
bmp(filename="grid13.bmp", width=401, height=401)
par(mar=rep(0,4), xaxs="i", yaxs="i")
plot(c(0, 400), c(0, 400), type="n", axes=FALSE, ylim=c(400, 0))
polygon(c(0, 400, 400, 0), c(0, 0, 400, 400),
  border=NA, col=rgb(0.99, 0.99, 1))
abline(v=(1:39)*10, col="lightgreen", lty="dotted")
abline(v=(0:10)*40, col="darkgreen")
abline(h=(1:39)*10, col="lightgreen", lty="dotted")
abline(h=(0:10)*40, col="darkgreen")
for (i in (1:9)*40) {
  j <- 380
  k <-   9
  polygon(c(j-k, j+k, j+k, j-k), c(i+k, i+k, i-k, i-k), 
    border=NA, density=NA, col="white")
  text(j, i, i, col="darkgreen")
  j <- 380
  k <-   9
  polygon(c(i+k, i+k, i-k, i-k), c(j-k, j+k, j+k, j-k), 
    border=NA, density=NA, col="white")
  text(i, j, i, col="darkgreen")
}
dev.off()
```
